text: Hi, my name is Robert.
hi, my name is danh
I will like a few minutes of your time to tell you about " Save The Children Foundation".
ok please do
Save the Children is an international non-governmental organization that promotes children's rights, provides relief and helps support children in developing countries.
I think it's important for us to be more aware of the difficulty children are facing every single day in term of parental support, and lack of love.
Yes, you are right, save the children is what you are saying also Your donation will make a tangible impact for the world such as help ensuring children's rights to health, education and safety.
what are you suggesting?
I am asking for a small donation.
right now I just started this online job and this is my first conversation to make money. can I take a raincheck ?
If you can a donation of .01 to $2.00 will be great, but first bear with me a little longer.
can you speed up the conversation?
You can donate to an individual child or a group of children.
Can you be more specific?
If you can donate 5 cents that will be great.
I'm willing to donate 5 cents.
Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment.
Ok. I'm authorizing you to deduct 5 cents from my task payment.
Thank you very much.
is there anything else I can do for you?
